text: We present timely short-term forecasts for reported cases of COVID-19 in Guangdong and Zhejiang, China. Based on data reported up to 13 February 2020, the models predict 65-81 additional cases (UB: 169-507) in Guangdong and 44-354 (UB: 141-875) additional cases in Zhejiang by 23 February 2020. Overall, our forecasts suggest that the epidemics in these two provinces continue to slow down.
